div.h3: The District is Closed Until May 15, 2020

div.div: All District Athletic Facilities Closed Please be advised that per the Governor's recommendation, all district athletic facilities, including the tracks and ball fields, are closed for use to allow for social distancing. Thank you for your cooperation.

div.h3: Toddler Program Lottery – Deadline for Applications Extended through June 14
div.div:
The high school's Early Childhood Education Program has 16 available openings for the two-year toddler program. If selected, your child will be paired with a student from Northport's Family and Consumer Science class, where students will be studying toddler development twice a week.
There may be additional openings for our 3 and 4 year old program. If you want to be placed on this list, complete the application. One application will be used for all 3 programs.
Applications can be found here, and are due no later than June 14, 2020.
For more information, call the office of Assistant Principal Carlos Falcón at 631-262-6664.
